title: France panorama. [No. 68/17]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The Eighth of May 1945 - An evocation by Monsieur Maurice Schumann, former spokesman for the “Free French”. 2. Industrial cooperation - Unveiling a new Franco-British jet trainer - the Jaguar. 3. Holy Week - A nocturnal Easter procession at Sauges in the Massif Central. 4. The arts - Antoine Watteau exhibition in Paris.
